Package MARDA

Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
MARDA.FileManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
PloyFileManager
public abstract class FileManager extends Object
Abstract class that manages the saving and loading of game files.

      Loads a file.
      Returns:
      error code, 0 on success

    • chooseFile

      private File chooseFile()
      Brings up a prompt allowing the user to choose a file.
      Returns:
      the file chosen

    • saveFile

      protected abstract void saveFile(Object[] players, int gameMode, Object board, String fileName)
      Saves a file with the current board's status.
      Parameters:
      players - array of players in the game
      gameMode - the game mode being played
      board - the board object with all its information
      fileName - the name the save file will have
